data.text:
Ciudad de Sueca

Sueca

Situated in the town of Sueca, near Valencia, this practical and well-equipped hotel is ideal for those visiting the area on business as well as for tourism. Each of the rooms in Ciudad de Sueca is spacious, where you can enjoy tranquillity and..... view morefrom

€ 41Casa La Torreta

Corbera de Alcira

Casa La Torreta is set in Corbera, 35 minutes' drive from Valencia. It offers free bicycle use, a gym, spa and outdoor pool. All accommodation offers free Wi-Fi and views of the town’s Mediaeval Castle... view morefrom

€ 102Hotel Lluna

Alzira

Offering a restaurant serving Spanish cuisine, Hotel Lluna is located in Alzira. Set 6 minutes’ drive from Santa Maria de la Murta Monastery, the air-conditioned hotel features a terrace and free Wi-Fi... view morefrom

€ 35Cullera Holiday

Cullera

The Cullera Holiday hotel is just 100 metres from the beach and 35 minutes' drive from the city of Valencia. It has a swimming pool and a free Wi-Fi zone. The rooms are decorated in a modern style with wooden floors and flat-screen TVs... view morefrom

€ 54Apartamentos Milenio

Cullera

These self-catering apartments overlook the river and mountains from their setting in Cullera – a pretty coastal town on the Costa Blanca with over 15 km of Blue-Flag beaches. Enjoy the spectacular, eighth-floor views from your own balcony... view morefrom
